/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. The buildings lining the street are predominantly red and white, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun is shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
